duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and evaluate hospital inpatient medical record documentation to assign and sequence the appropriate ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS codes.
Complete the coding sections of the IRF-PAI, both concurrently while the patient is in-house and post discharge.
Accept, edit, or delete auto-suggested codes and assign appropriate codes using CAC technology.
Abstract various data elements (e.g., physician, discharge disposition) and issue physician queries when necessary.
Participate in ongoing coding education and support coding accuracy activities.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or GED equivalent required
Undergraduate (Associate's or Bachelor's) degree in HIM/HIT preferred
